arStrings.szText: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Critical Strikes with {c_important}Poison Imbued{/c} Skills have up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"|%|]{/c} chance to create a toxic pool that deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Poisoning damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds to enemies within. While standing in the pool, your {c_important}Poison Imbuement{/c} Skill has no Cooldown and no Charge limit.
